articles.description: Since he lifted the World Cup on December 18, Messi's official Instagram account, which has 414 million followers, has promoted six different brands in paid partnerships.
articles.content:
Football star Lionel Messi stands to make millions from sponsored Instagram posts following his World Cup success with Argentina - and he could even overtake his great rival Cristiano Ronaldo.
Since… [+4194 chars]

articles.title: Is Liverpool's season OVER? Jurgen Klopp hit with Virgil van Dijk injury! - talkSPORT
articles.description: Things go to bad from worse for Liverpool as Virgil van Dijk is set to be hit with a lengthy time on the sidelines due to a hamstring injury suffered in the ...
